attributes.action: Request the Chinese government to give a referendum to the people of Hong Kong to return to the UK
attributes.additional_details: I for one believe that the citizens of Hong Kong got absolutely no say on how their future should be run and when the 50 year agreement the UK government and Chinese government singed runs out they will most certainly loose all their liberties the same liberties which they got used to under the British I don't think a great city like Hong Kong should end up like that and hopefully you will too let's give it to them!
